title: kristycryptop
author: kristycryptop
content: Loan Amount: 2.5 LTCLoan Purpose: Salary Delay Loan Repay Amount: 3 LTCLoan Repay Date: 3 weeks or LessType of Collateral: None\AccountEscrow profile link: None LTC Address: ltc1qkxe9q77ya0azssasmwkhpy9vxtmzvqxpxqd6ns

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 05:10:28 AMLoan Amount: 2.5 LTCLoan Purpose: Salary Delay Loan Repay Amount: 3 LTCLoan Repay Date: 3 weeks or LessType of Collateral: None\AccountEscrow profile link: None LTC Address: ltc1qkxe9q77ya0azssasmwkhpy9vxtmzvqxpxqd6ns Try your local bank or ask a friend or family, its not quite normal behavior to open an account in a forum and ten minutes later ask strangers for a loan.The normal thing to do is to present yourself, show who you are and your intentions, and maybe a couple of months/a year later it could be OK to ask somebody here for a loan when you proved yourself honest.If i was in need of some money i would ask some friend and i would have the money ten minutes later.Its just strange... i don´t understand why totally new accounts go in and straight ask for a loan, they cant for real believe that somebody would send money to a total stranger.But is not the best thing to brainstorm and try to find out something your good at and see if its possible to make any money out of that instead?I am saying this with all respect.But maybe focus on something else instead of trying to get a loan is the first way to go.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Wait for it. Shasan is processing it :-P

comments.author: kristycryptop
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on May 01, 2023, 05:18:09 AMQuote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 05:10:28 AMLoan Amount: 2.5 LTCLoan Purpose: Salary Delay Loan Repay Amount: 3 LTCLoan Repay Date: 3 weeks or LessType of Collateral: None\AccountEscrow profile link: None LTC Address: ltc1qkxe9q77ya0azssasmwkhpy9vxtmzvqxpxqd6ns Try your local bank or ask a friend or family, its not quite normal behavior to open an account in a forum and ten minutes later ask strangers for a loan.The normal thing to do is to present yourself, show who you are and your intentions, and maybe a couple of months/a year later it could be OK to ask somebody here for a loan when you proved yourself honest.If i was in need of some money i would ask some friend and i would have the money ten minutes later.Its just strange... i don´t understand why totally new accounts go in and straight ask for a loan, they cant for real believe that somebody would send money to a total stranger.But is not the best thing to brainstorm and try to find out something your good at and see if its possible to make any money out of that instead?I am saying this with all respect.But maybe focus on something else instead of trying to get a loan is the first way to go.its an account from 2021 I'm just not that active

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 06:32:15 AM~~~its an account from 2021 I'm just not that active Even if the account was registered in 2011 or the same date Satoshi created his, as long as it does not meet the requirements of the lender then it does not matter and in your case you just spawned out of nowhere and instantly started demanding for a loan. I'm sorry but you won't find anyone in this forum that'll want to put his or her money at risk.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 05:10:28 AMLoan Amount: 2.5 LTCLoan Purpose: Salary Delay Loan Repay Amount: 3 LTCLoan Repay Date: 3 weeks or LessType of Collateral: None\AccountEscrow profile link: None LTC Address: ltc1qkxe9q77ya0azssasmwkhpy9vxtmzvqxpxqd6ns Based on what others have said regarding loan requirements, you might be old here in the forum, but you have not really made any reasonable contribution here or even obtained any rank here, which can guarantee that you can't leave the account and run.Your level of account needs collateral—a valid one for that matter—that will correspond with your requesting loan amount so that if you default, the lender will not completely be on the losing side; they can just sell off the collateral and take back their money.So if you are really interested in the loan, go get some collateral, or better yet, borrow from family and friends, just as a member has suggested here; they can consider giving you a loan since they know your background.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 06:32:15 AMits an account from 2021 I'm just not that active But you thought you would only be active here when seeking for a no-collateral loan?2.5 LTC is worth about $215, are you trying to say you don't have any friends or relatives that could lend you such a small amount with no collateral or interest involved?

comments.author: kristycryptop
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 01, 2023, 10:40:07 PMQuote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 06:32:15 AMits an account from 2021 I'm just not that active But you thought you would only be active here when seeking for a no-collateral loan?2.5 LTC is worth about $215, are you trying to say you don't have any friends or relatives that could lend you such a small amount with no collateral or interest involved?Your mother didn't teach you don't judge a book from his cover ? -_-simply I can't ask my friends I prefer to keep things in secret and yeah I can ask a strangers why not ?! if they don't then fine Second it's not like I appear from nowhere I'm here a long time I didn't comments in posts I was just watching and getting knowledge!! even I don't such an activity doesn't mean you can come here and say those things !!yeah your a legend that's cool but theres no rights u have to tell people what to do !Lets keep BitcoinTalk a wonderful place don't ruin it

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: May 02, 2023, 10:44:45 AMLast edit: May 02, 2023, 11:32:49 AM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 02, 2023, 10:27:36 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 01, 2023, 10:40:07 PMQuote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 06:32:15 AMits an account from 2021 I'm just not that active But you thought you would only be active here when seeking for a no-collateral loan?2.5 LTC is worth about $215, are you trying to say you don't have any friends or relatives that could lend you such a small amount with no collateral or interest involved?Your mother didn't teach you don't judge a book from his cover ? -_-simply I can't ask my friends I prefer to keep things in secret and yeah I can ask a strangers why not ?! if they don't then fine Second it's not like I appear from nowhere I'm here a long time I didn't comments in posts I was just watching and getting knowledge!! even I don't such an activity doesn't mean you can come here and say those things !!yeah your a legend that's cool but theres no rights u have to tell people what to do !Lets keep BitcoinTalk a wonderful place don't ruin it Your kidding right?So... basically people should lend money to the right and left and give everyone a chance no matter what?People that would do that, would run OUT of money and business very fast, that´s fact. But please, prove me wrong, start a lending business and accept every loan apply and we see how  long time your business will be running then you can come back and say at least you did not judge a book from his cover. Its a REASON banks don´t lend money to everyone, because lending money is a business and not charity.If you don`t want to ask your friends because you don't want them to know your in need of money then i guess its not that important either.Forum or no forum, you don´t go and ask people you just meet for financing help, that's part of a normal behavior and respect.Financing problem is something an adult should be able to fix himself/herself, and sometime we all have some kind of problem, that´s part of life.. but there is when FAMILY & FRIENDS come in to the picture and helping out, just because they are... FAMILY & FRIENDS, and family & friends help each other out. You don´t go out and ask totally strangers for help, that just so wrong and strange!And i am saying this with all respect and try to make people understand how life works, you cant just woke one day and think people on a forum gonna solve your problems, get dirty and fix it yourself, and you will feel much better as a human and it will give you more strength to climb even higher in life!I know because I have been on the deepest and darkest bottom.I have spent many years in prison & I was basically homeless without any penny or anything and today i have change my life totally to the better, nothing is impossible it will just take a lot of effort and time.But think strangers will help you is nothing else then waste of time.

comments.author: kristycryptop
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on May 02, 2023, 10:44:45 AMQuote from: kristycryptop on May 02, 2023, 10:27:36 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on May 01, 2023, 10:40:07 PMQuote from: kristycryptop on May 01, 2023, 06:32:15 AMits an account from 2021 I'm just not that active But you thought you would only be active here when seeking for a no-collateral loan?2.5 LTC is worth about $215, are you trying to say you don't have any friends or relatives that could lend you such a small amount with no collateral or interest involved?Your mother didn't teach you don't judge a book from his cover ? -_-simply I can't ask my friends I prefer to keep things in secret and yeah I can ask a strangers why not ?! if they don't then fine Second it's not like I appear from nowhere I'm here a long time I didn't comments in posts I was just watching and getting knowledge!! even I don't such an activity doesn't mean you can come here and say those things !!yeah your a legend that's cool but theres no rights u have to tell people what to do !Lets keep BitcoinTalk a wonderful place don't ruin it Your kidding right?So... basically people should lend money to the right and left and give everyone a chance no matter what?People that would do that, would run OUT of money and business very fast, that´s fact. But please, prove me wrong, start a lending business and accept every loan apply and we see how  long time your business will be running then you can come back and say at least you did not judge a book from his cover. Its a REASON banks don´t lend money to everyone, because lending money is a business and not charity.If you don`t want to ask your friends because you don't want them to know your in need of money then i guess its not that important either.Forum or no forum, you don´t go and ask people you just meet for financing help, that's part of a normal behavior and respect.Financing problem is something an adult should be able to fix himself/herself, and sometime we all have some kind of problem, that´s part of life.. but there is when FAMILY & FRIENDS come in to the picture and helping out, just because they are... FAMILY & FRIENDS, and family & friends help each other out. You don´t go out and ask totally strangers for help, that just so wrong and strange!True , But I'm not in Financial Crisis yet and yeah you can't know for sure if I'm saying true or not .Family and Friends ? sorry I live in my own castle I have no-one but myself , Again its only Salary Delay and if I don't find someone its ok I can manage .I will stop responding so we won't go to wrong direction of this conversation , Sorry if I go too far with my words but I'm a girl with complicated  history . I just hate when someone tell you what to do before they know you ! just don't judge quickly

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: O.P. : Time to lock this thread given you have created a new thread for the same loan application.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: kristycryptop on May 02, 2023, 10:27:36 AMYour mother didn't teach you don't judge a book from his cover ? -_-My mother also taught me not just trust any stranger on the internet  Quotesimply I can't ask my friends I prefer to keep things in secret  Then that's your problem, if you can't even open up to your friends and family. Then what makes you think an internet stranger is the right person to do the job?Judging by your attitude, I guess you are the problem and so there are no friends to turn to.QuoteSecond it's not like I appear from nowhere I'm here a long time I didn't comments in posts I was just watching and getting knowledge!! even I don't such an activity doesn't mean you can come here and say those things !!Nobody cares if you were registered here even 20 years ago. The fact remains, you don't have any reputation that one could base on to give you a benefit of doubt and send you a no collateral loan. Your reputation would be your leverage, which you don't have.Quoteyeah your a legend that's cool but theres no rights u have to tell people what to do !Have I said anywhere that I am a legend?QuoteLets keep BitcoinTalk a wonderful place don't ruin it You noobs who just wake up out of nowhere and come here for no collateral loans are the ones ruining the forum and scamming people by defaulting loans.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: it's funny cowboy you say this Financing problem is something an adult should be able to fix himself/herselfhowever i see many people here asking other people for loan ...  so is that also "fixing" the problem by their own ? because frankly i can't see it Also you do remember that they are people that have no family or not have alot of friends right?  so what about those ?  they are out of luck ?  there are people that dont like to show of their financial problems just like me and want an anonymous loan instead on the internet   did i commit a crime here ?  you tell me

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: May 03, 2023, 10:18:32 AMLast edit: May 03, 2023, 05:44:48 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on May 03, 2023, 09:22:11 AMit's funny cowboy you say this Financing problem is something an adult should be able to fix himself/herselfhowever i see many people here asking other people for loan ...  so is that also "fixing" the problem by their own ? because frankly i can't see it Also you do remember that they are people that have no family or not have alot of friends right?  so what about those ?  they are out of luck ?  there are people that dont like to show of their financial problems just like me and want an anonymous loan instead on the internet   did i commit a crime here ?  you tell meThis will be my last reply to you ever, but probably you wont understand that and keep replying to me and spamming my loan thread when you feel for it.YES an adult should be able to fix their own financing problem, its nothing wrong with taking a loan if you have intentions to pay back and you have money on the way.What is wrong is ask for a loan but DON´T have money on the way, for example: you are broke today, will be it tomorrow and next week and next month.If you would get a loan for $500 today, that money would be gone in one week. and next month when its time to pay back, you would still.. be broke but you would have one more problem in your hands, a loan to pay back.I don´t think you have intentions to scam anyone for $500 to be honest, if you would get money you would pay back but the risk of you actually getting money is like 0.5% out of 100%.$500 would help you for like one week, then you would be back in your situation. If you always are in need of a loan, you are never able to pay back a loan.Also what is wrong is coming in to a forum and ten minutes later ask for a loan. Its nothing else then disrespect and stupidity. I DON´T have any family or friends either, i am all alone in my life. Do you see me searching for luck here? Do you see me crying and feel sorry for my self? No! I man up and do my best to solve my problems.I find solutions, i try to find out what I am good at and using that to earn money. Everyday I doing my best and trying to be better then the past.Now. Please never ever reply or think of me again, you are just waste of time.But with that said, i really wish you all the luck and hope you solving your problems in life someday, i dont want anyone to struggle in life or anything like that, i know how it is and its not fun at all. BUT I can promise you one thing - that a LOAN wont help you solving anything, it will just push your problems forwards.Wish you the best.Best regards CC!

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: Okay very clearly you wont be sent litecoins for just asking it on this forum section.Typing an ammount 5LTCAnd poping some adress clearly isnt workingOn the other hand, there is no point in spaming jokes and sort of shit on the topic... Ignore is a good option
